value.name: Barbara Hendel: Love is in the air at Toledo Opera Gala
value.description: The four resident artists performed, too: Grace Wipfli, soprano; Olivia Johnson, mezzo soprano; Andrew Payne, baritone; and Emily Morin, pianist. Applause and bravos were after each wonderful performance, followed by a standing ovation at the end.
